ygData.subject: OT. remember the song "kiss the rain"...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Everyone, Remember that song that came out a couple of years ago called Kiss the Rain by Billie Myers?  It was all over the radio stations, and then a
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Everyone,

Remember that song that came out a couple of years ago called
"Kiss
the Rain" by Billie Myers? It was all over the radio stations,
and
then a remix of it came out on dance stations a few months later.
The album was called "Growing Pains," and it was a critical
success
for Billie.

Well guess what, Billie Myers is back with a new album, Vertigo.
Check out her new single, "Am I Here Yet," which features
sample of
Hot Chocolate's "You Sexy Thing"

Here's a preview of the album in real audio:
http://207.69.194.207/GP/D9a.ASP?a_id=268


Well, even if you aren't familiar with Billie Myers, this is one
album that's definitely worth checking out. Blurring the lines
between rock, pop and, soul, with songs like "Am I Here Yet"
or "Should I Call You Jesus," Vertigo strongly mirrors the
woman that
Billie Myers has become. The album just hit the stores on June 6th,
so you should definitely check it out. Now, here's a flash card
from the album, from Billie to all of you. Check it out and pass it
along.

http://www.electricartists.com/billiemyers/Billie2.exe

I'm working with Billie and her label, so if you'd like more
info,
regular updates, some giveaways, or would like to join our online
street team and help spread the word on her album, drop me an email
at:

billie_info@...


Take care,
AMY
